text: Motion
Motion
Motion

─Hey, hey, we're going to do a live at the beach next
time, right? I want to hear your advice and stuff!

I know you two are amazing, but if we cause trouble during
the actual live, it'll be a problem, so let me cause some trouble now!

If we could have Mei-chan's stage presence
from the other day, I think it would be totally fine...

Since it's a project sponsored by a TV station,
maybe we should be conscious of appealing to TV audiences...

Maybe wink at the camera crew or fans you
make eye contact with and say "I love you ♡"...

But that wouldn't be Mei-chan,
it would be a lie.

Sorry, Mei-chan...!
I don't mean to ask you to force yourself or anything...!

...But, we're idols,
so I think it's important to consider fan service too.

...?
Is it really not okay as it is?

It's not like you have to lie to
make people like you, right?

So instead of forcing
yourself to be liked...

Isn't it better if people like you
without you having to force it?

...Asahi-chan, you're amazing.
I'm a little jealous.

...But you know,
not everyone is as strong as Asahi-chan.
...No way.
That's why, for Asahi-chan...

That's not true!
Because...

People who can endure a lot are strong...
Isn't that right?
...I think it's different for fuyu.

Is that so?
Then, I stand corrected.
